title: Trapezoidal Diamond Pendant - Modern Nakshi Design
features: Modern trapezoidal silhouette with layered geometric designs. Each layer is meticulously set with shimmering brilliant cut diamonds. The open design creates a sense of lightness and allows maximum light to enter, amplifying the brilliance of the diamonds. Clean lines and modern setting.
occasions: Suitable for both everyday wear and special occasions. Perfect for adding a touch of modern elegance to a simple outfit or complementing a sophisticated evening look. Ideal for anniversaries
description: Unique geometric design that blends modern aesthetics with fine diamond craftsmanship. High-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail guarantee a durable and lasting piece. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the rose gold's luster. VS clarity diamonds provide exceptional brilliance and sparkle. The open setting maximizes light reflection, creating a dazzling effect.
